Package at.htlkaindorf.ahif18.gui

Class Editor

java.lang.Object
at.htlkaindorf.ahif18.gui.Editor
public class Editor extends Object
The Editor class represents the GUI. These class contains JavaSwing objects, listeners, methods for code highlighting and so on
Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
Fabian Ladenhaufen

    • findLastNonWordChar

      private int findLastNonWordChar(String text, int index)
      Finds the position of the last character of a word
      Parameters:
      text - contains the full editor text
      index - index position of the last typed character
      Returns:
      last index position of the current word

    • codeCompletion

      private void codeCompletion(String text, int offset)
      Makes a autocompletion when a specific character is typed in If a parenthesis or a quote is entered, a second one will be set and the cursor position will be set in the middle
      Parameters:
      text - contains the full current editor text
      offset - position of the last typed character
      Since:
      1.0
